generate_panchromatic.py¶

Generate simulated panchromatic image for Landsat TM data.

usage: generate_panchromatic.py [-h] [-o OUTPUTSCENE] inputscene

Positional Arguments¶

inputscene Base Landsat scene name (do not specify bands) to be read in.

Named Arguments¶

-o, --outputscene
 Output scene name (if unspecified, defaults to inputscenename_B8.TIF)
